short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the political articles from Engadget.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of Politics on Engadget? This extension will remove those pesky articles.
This extension scans for a topic tag equal to "Politics" and hides the article.

What's new?

0.0.5
Updated ext Name
Added a few more terms to block

0.0.4
Now hides Politics category as well as articles that match terms in title and description.
